snippet: The company, based in Fort Lauderdale, Fla., said on Tuesday that it sold 33,069 new vehicles in December.
abstract: AutoNation, largest dealership chain in the United States, reports 12 percent sales increase in December 2014 following outstanding report from auto industry.
lead_paragraph: The company, based in Fort Lauderdale, Fla., said on Tuesday that it sold 33,069 new vehicles in December.

headline.main: AutoNation Says Its Sales Rose 12 Percent in December
headline.print_headline: AutoNation Says Its Sales Rose 12 Percent in December
